home.introText: Right in the heart of Sombor town, this delightful apartment is the perfect place to relax and explore the sights. You'll have a private entrance, a cozy living room, a fully equipped kitchen, a comfortable queen-size bed, and an extra sofa bed for two. Plus, we have a charming garden for your relaxation anytime during the day.

query.visit: Check available dates and visit us!

testimonials.name: Anonymous
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: The apartment was spacious and super clean with everything you'd need. It is located close to downtown and I parked my vehicle and walked to buy groceries and get to a bank. I received help with my bags both arriving and leaving as well as advice on local amenities as well as tips for upcoming travel areas for the next week or so. I couldn't have asked for more and the price was very reasonable. Thanks for a great stay!

testimonials.name: Milutinovic
testimonials.title: A hidden gem in the heart of Sombor
testimonials.text: Located behind the picturesque neoclassicism architecture facade, the apartment is private, secure, comfortable, spacious and well decorated. It is equipped with a good size bed, ample storage, TV, mini fridge, tea and coffee facilities, hairdryer and bathroom toiletries. The property includes a shared outdoor space with a cozy deck and courtyard. Upon request, free parking is also available. The host is friendly, available when required and offers great suggestions on things to see and do in and around Sombor. Sombor is a walkable city and the city center is a short walk from the apartment. I look forward to returning as a guest on my next visit.

testimonials.name: Milijana
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: Dragan is an exceptional host, he directed us to excellent sights and restaurants in Sombor. Our pets were also welcome. The accommodation has a beautiful and peaceful garden. It is located only three minutes from the city center. We have also recommended the accommodation to our friends.

testimonials.name: Gregor
testimonials.title: We are coming back 😀
testimonials.text: Host is a great guy! He can suggest places to see. Room and bathroom were clean. Nice big bed. Really nice backyard inside of the property.

testimonials.name: Janet
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: The apartment was nicely furnished and spacious and well appointed. The garden was welcoming and well maintained. A delight.

testimonials.name: Vorkapic
testimonials.title: Quiet and comfy
testimonials.text: The host is amazing, the apartment was clean and had all you need (towles, shampoo, toothpaste, kettle, coffee, tea etc). Also, there is a very nice garden you can relax in, and it takes 3 minutes to get to the city centre.

testimonials.name: Roberta
testimonials.title: Nice and cozy
testimonials.text: An apartment is in walk distance from centre. Even though is nearby a busy street, it was quite enough for sleeping. Dragan is great host and very helpful. Negative: That we came in winter 😉 A beautifull has a great summer potential. Everything else was top amd we will come again!

testimonials.name: Bronwyn
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: Wonderful communication with Dragan. Room is lovely, various coffees and teas, kettle,fridge, air con great, shower products etc. Courtyard with lots nice areas to sit in. Close to centre. Secured place to leave bicycles if travelling the EuroVelo. Excellent value for money.

testimonials.name: Jelena
testimonials.title: I would definitely come back here
testimonials.text: It is clean, cozy, spacious apartment with pleasant garden where you can chill out. Apartment is clean and quiet, has everything that you need, it even has a parking spot so you don’t have to worry about that. Communication with the host was perfect. The location is 2 minutes walking distance from downtown.

testimonials.name: Jean-claude
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: Perfect location in the center of Sombor. Dragon is a wonderful host who welcomes you in his beautifully renovated town house. The apartment is well sized, clean and cozy. Private parking and a nice garden are an absolute plus. Perfect wifi, quiet and all you need in walking distance. Highly recommended and good value for money.

testimonials.name: Benoit
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: Dragan was perfect host, very welcoming. We enjoyed beautiful and quiet backyard, very comfortable, clean and well equipped room. Location is excellent.

testimonials.name: Oldřich
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: Good communication with the owner. By agreement, arrival already at noon. Mr. Dragan is a pleasant communicative person who explained everything to us and recommended where to go. Parking in front of the house. 5 minutes walk to the center. Clean apartment. A less comfortable extra bed for an adult.

testimonials.name: Marko
testimonials.title: Idyll in Sombor ❤️
testimonials.text: The apartment is extremely clean and comfortable, with beautiful furniture, like in aristocratic houses. 1 min. walk from the center. The yard is pleasant and surrounded by greenery, ideal for rest. We went to an unknown booker, and made a friend Dragan, who is unobtrusive, but always available for any information. Urban character, traveled the world, and applies his rich experiences, gained around the world. Sombor=Sombor 19 Central Apartment❤️. Everything is like from a fairy tale❤️.

testimonials.name: Anton
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: The owner is Dragan, a wonderful person. Open, good-natured, always ready to help. He told us everything that interested us. The apartments themselves are cozy, quiet, clean. There is all the necessary equipment. The location is excellent, within walking distance from the city center. There is free parking right outside the gate. A very beautiful courtyard - it is clear that the owner puts his soul into its arrangement. I highly recommend these apartments.

testimonials.name: Katarzyna
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: The host Dragan, on his own initiative, corrected my reservation for a more favorable one - thanks to this, we had rooms next to each other. He even sent me a video of what it would look like. A wonderful man. Housing clean rooms, elegant bathrooms, with the necessary cosmetics (and those that may come in handy ;)) Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Marijanović
testimonials.title: Exceptional
testimonials.text: Beautifully decorated, a suite even more beautiful live with a beautiful courtyard, full of greenery with the freedom to enjoy the maximum. Full-space hygiene on the highest level. Host Dragan is completely forthcoming, a man with a big heart who has no difficulty pleasing his guests. A great recommendation for all those seeking accommodation, comfort and peace in Sombor. Thank you, Dragan, for his sake, this space will remain in my heart and I will gladly return! A straight 10!
